availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Hopkinsville post office, Christian County, Kentucky. A Kentucky-born farmer. Son of James B. Witty and Lucinda Coone. Married Tiercy. Father of Georgella, Mary A., James B., Emma, and Laura Witty.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Hopkinsville post office, p. 133.
Kentucky, Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates- Microfilm (1911-1964), Microfilm Roll # 7017476, KLA, File # 23766.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, Fruit Hill Precinct, p. 28.
